attributes.action: make the 25th April National Ken Barlow Day and a Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that his services to our country should be recognised by naming the 25th of April "Barlow Day".  This year Ken celebrates his 75th birthday and 47 years of which has been on our television sets on the ever popular Coronation Street.  Plus he has just gone through a terrible time with his daughter Tracy.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
